document: INSTRUMENTATION FOR THE STUDY OF RAPID BIOLOGICAL OXIDATION-REDUCTION REACTIONS BY EPR AND OPTICAL SPECTROSCOPY by David Penfield Ballou A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Biological Chemistry) in The University of Michigan 1971 Doctoral Committee: Associate Professor Graham Palmer, Chairman Associate Professor Donald E. Hultquist Associate Professor Hiroshi Ikuma Professor Vincent Massey Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner. Further reproduction prohibited without permission.
